scripts.dev:ios: concurrently -k -n vite,ns 'npm run dev:server:ios' 'wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run ios'
scripts.dev:android: concurrently -k -n vite,ns 'npm run dev:server:android' 'wait-on tcp:5173 && npm run android'
scripts.dev:web: cd nativescript-web-adapter && npm run create:web && cd ../platforms/web && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.postinstall: patch-package && cd nativescript-web-adapter && npm install && npm run build
